org.apache.river.test.spec.discoverymanager

Class GroupsMulticastMonitorReplaceAll

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.river.qa.harness.QATestEnvironment
      • org.apache.river.test.share.BaseQATest
        • org.apache.river.test.spec.discoverymanager.AbstractBaseTest
          • org.apache.river.test.spec.discoverymanager.Discovered
            • org.apache.river.test.spec.discoverymanager.MulticastMonitorReplace
              • org.apache.river.test.spec.discoverymanager.MulticastMonitorReplaceAll
                • org.apache.river.test.spec.discoverymanager.GroupsMulticastMonitorReplaceAll
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Test, TestEnvironment

    public class GroupsMulticastMonitorReplaceAll
extends MulticastMonitorReplaceAll
    This class verifies that the LookupDiscoveryManager utility monitors, in a manner consistent with the specification, the mulitcast announcements received from lookup services it has discovered.

    In particular, this test verifies that when the member groups of a discovered lookup service are changed to a set containing NONE of the lookup service's original member groups, if the lookup discovery manager is configured to discover ALL_GROUPS, then the lookup discovery manager will send a changed event (rather than a discarded event) containing the appropriate contents. The environment in which this class expects to operate is as follows:

    • N lookup services having locator L0i, and belonging to groups {G0i,G1i,G2i}, where i = 0 ... N
    • one lookup discovery manager configured to discover ALL_GROUPS, and configured to discover none of the lookups by locator discovery
    • one instance of DiscoveryChangeListener registered with the lookup discovery manager
    • after discovery, each set of member groups is completely replaced with a new set

    If the lookup discovery manager functions as specified, then the client's listener will receive the expected number of changed events, with the expected contents. Related bug ids: 4292957

    See Also:
    MulticastMonitorReplaceAll
